hero.title: Authentic bistro in the heart of Bordeaux

about.title: Bienvenue
about.text1: Since 2007, Mimi and Manolo have been welcoming you to Michel's, a bistro nestled in the heart of the Saint-Pierre district of Bordeaux. Together, they have created a place where simplicity goes hand in hand with authenticity.
about.text2: Michel's is a neighborhood bistro where the cuisine is popular and generous, with dishes simmering and glasses filling up with conviviality. Here, no fuss: fresh products, a short but tasty menu, and a warm atmosphere.
about.text3: At Michel's, we don't take reservations, but we do take care of you. Whether you're a regular in the neighborhood or just passing through, step inside and let yourself be carried away by the atmosphere of this one-of-a-kind place.

footer.hours: Open every day from 8:00 AM to midnight
